name: Mana Caves
description:
Explore the Peaceful Reach, a small demo level for the Mana Caves.

A game project currently in development by Katelyst.

Please let us know in the comments what you think of the game, if you have any ideas for the game or when you find a new bug.

Controls:

WASD: movement

F: Interact

Left-Shift: Sprint

Left-Ctrl: Crouch

Space: Jump

Currently known bugs:

- Inconsistent ladder interaction 

- Crystals sometimes disappear
